channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: ðŸŸ¡ 11:22 The threat of artillery shelling in the Chervonohryhorivska territorial community has been eliminated. Please note, the alert is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
item.description: ðŸŸ¡ 11:22 The threat of artillery shelling in the Chervonohryhorivska territorial community has been eliminated. Please note, the alert is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk region #Chervonohryhorivska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
